fields.name: General Inquiry
fields.description: For general questions about AudioX.

fields.name: Account Access & Login
fields.description: Issues related to logging in, password resets, etc.

fields.name: Subscription & Billing
fields.description: Questions about subscription plans, payments, invoices.

fields.name: Technical Problem
fields.description: Bugs, errors, or other technical difficulties.

fields.name: Audiobook Upload Issue
fields.description: Problems with uploading or managing audiobooks.

fields.name: Creator Earnings & Payouts
fields.description: Questions about earnings, withdrawal requests.

fields.name: Account Registration Issue
fields.description: Problems encountered during the signup process, email verification, or initial account setup.

fields.name: Login & Password Reset
fields.description: Difficulty logging in, forgotten password, OTP issues, or problems with two-factor authentication (2FA).

fields.name: Update Profile Information
fields.description: Help with changing full name, username, email, phone number, bio, or other personal details.

fields.name: Profile Picture Issue
fields.description: Problems uploading, changing, or displaying profile picture.

fields.name: Account Notification Settings
fields.description: Questions or issues related to managing email, push, or in-app notification preferences.

fields.name: Account Privacy Settings
fields.description: Inquiries about managing account privacy, data visibility, or related settings.

fields.name: Request Account Deletion/Deactivation
fields.description: Inquiries about how to permanently delete or temporarily deactivate an account.

fields.name: Account Reactivation Issue
fields.description: Problems reactivating a previously deactivated account.

fields.name: Subscription Plan Inquiry
fields.description: Questions about different subscription plans, features, or pricing.

fields.name: Upgrade/Downgrade Subscription
fields.description: Issues or questions about changing an existing subscription plan.

fields.name: Payment Method Issue
fields.description: Problems adding, updating, or removing payment methods (credit/debit card, etc.).

fields.name: Subscription Payment Failed
fields.description: Issues related to a failed subscription payment, card declined, or auto-renewal problems.

fields.name: View Invoices & Billing History
fields.description: Difficulty accessing or understanding invoices, payment receipts, or billing history.

fields.name: Cancel Subscription
fields.description: Help with canceling an active subscription or understanding cancellation terms.

fields.name: Refund Request (Subscription)
fields.description: Inquiries about eligibility for a refund on a subscription charge.

fields.name: Buy Coins Issue
fields.description: Problems encountered while purchasing coin packs or payment failures for coins.

fields.name: Coin Balance Discrepancy
fields.description: Concerns about incorrect coin balance or missing coins after a purchase/activity.

fields.name: Using Coins for Audiobooks
fields.description: Issues with redeeming coins to purchase or unlock audiobooks.

fields.name: Gift Coins Issue
fields.description: Problems sending or receiving gifted coins, or inquiries about the gifting process.

fields.name: Coin Transaction History
fields.description: Difficulty viewing or understanding coin transaction history.

fields.name: Promotional Coins/Codes Issue
fields.description: Problems with redeeming promotional coin codes or issues with bonus coins not appearing.

fields.name: Audiobook Search & Discovery
fields.description: Difficulty finding specific audiobooks, genres, or authors; issues with search filter accuracy.

fields.name: Audiobook Playback Error
fields.description: Problems with the audio player, errors during playback, audio not loading, or skipping issues.

fields.name: Audio Quality Issue
fields.description: Reporting poor audio quality, low volume, static, or other sound-related problems for an audiobook.

fields.name: Buffering or Streaming Problem
fields.description: Excessive buffering, interruptions during streaming, or slow loading of audio content.

fields.name: Offline Downloads Issue
fields.description: Problems downloading audiobooks for offline listening, or issues with accessing downloaded content.

fields.name: My Library Management
fields.description: Issues adding, removing, or organizing audiobooks in "My Library".

fields.name: Listening History Problem
fields.description: Listening history not updating correctly, progress not saving, or inaccurate tracking.

fields.name: Content Availability / Regional Restriction
fields.description: Questions about why an audiobook is not available or if there are regional restrictions.

fields.name: Issue with Audiobook Chapters/Narration
fields.description: Problems with chapter order, missing chapters, incorrect narration, or issues with narrator's voice.

fields.name: Website Bug / Error Message
fields.description: Reporting a specific bug, error message (please provide details), or unexpected behavior on the website.

fields.name: Mobile App Issue
fields.description: Reporting bugs, crashes, or performance problems specific to the AudioX mobile application (if applicable).

fields.name: Slow Performance / Loading Times
fields.description: General issues with slow loading of pages, features, or content on the platform.

fields.name: UI/UX Problem
fields.description: Feedback or issues related to confusing navigation, layout problems, or general usability (User Interface/Experience).

fields.name: Accessibility Issue
fields.description: Reporting problems related to accessibility for users with disabilities (e.g., screen reader compatibility, keyboard navigation).

fields.name: Creator Application Process
fields.description: Questions about the creator application form, required information, or general process.

fields.name: Creator Document Submission
fields.description: Problems uploading CNIC, bank details, or other verification documents.

fields.name: Creator Application Status Inquiry
fields.description: Checking the status of a pending creator application.

fields.name: Creator Application Rejection Reason
fields.description: Seeking clarification on why a creator application was rejected or how to address issues.

fields.name: Creator Re-application Process
fields.description: Questions about eligibility or process for re-applying after a rejection.

fields.name: Creator Terms & Conditions Inquiry
fields.description: Questions about the terms and conditions for AudioX creators.

fields.name: Audiobook Upload Process (Creator)
fields.description: Issues with the audiobook upload form, file formats, metadata entry (title, author, genre, etc.).

fields.name: Cover Art Upload Issue (Creator)
fields.description: Problems uploading or displaying the audiobook cover art.

fields.name: Chapter Management (Creator)
fields.description: Issues adding, ordering, editing, or deleting audiobook chapters.

fields.name: Audio File Processing Error (Creator)
fields.description: Errors encountered after uploading audio files for chapters (e.g., processing failed, format not supported).

fields.name: Edit/Update Existing Audiobook (Creator)
fields.description: Problems modifying details, chapters, or files for an already uploaded audiobook.

fields.name: Audiobook Status Inquiry (Creator)
fields.description: Questions about why an uploaded audiobook is pending review, rejected, or paused.

fields.name: TTS: Document Processing Failed
fields.description: Errors when trying to upload or process a document (PDF, DOCX) for TTS generation.

fields.name: TTS: Voice Selection / Quality
fields.description: Issues with available TTS voices, audio quality of generated speech, or pronunciation problems.

fields.name: TTS: Preview or Download Issue
fields.description: Problems generating a TTS preview, or issues with the downloaded TTS audio file.

fields.name: Content Visibility (Creator)
fields.description: Concerns that an approved/published audiobook is not appearing in search or listings.

fields.name: Understanding Earnings Report
fields.description: Questions about how to interpret the earnings dashboard, sales data, or revenue calculations.

fields.name: Earnings Discrepancy
fields.description: Belief that reported earnings are incorrect or do not match expected sales/views.

fields.name: Analytics Data Inquiry (Creator)
fields.description: Questions about listener statistics, audiobook performance metrics, or demographic data.

fields.name: Withdrawal Account Setup
fields.description: Problems adding or verifying bank account, JazzCash, Easypaisa, or other payout methods.

fields.name: Payout Request Issue
fields.description: Difficulty submitting a withdrawal request, or issues with the request form.

fields.name: Withdrawal Status Inquiry
fields.description: Checking the status of a pending, processing, or completed withdrawal.

fields.name: Minimum Payout Threshold
fields.description: Questions about the minimum balance required for a withdrawal.

fields.name: Payout Fees & Deductions
fields.description: Inquiries about any fees or deductions applied to creator payouts.

fields.name: Tax Information (Creator)
fields.description: Questions related to tax forms, withholding, or other tax-related matters for creators.

fields.name: Creator Public Profile Setup
fields.description: Help customizing the public creator page, bio, links, or unique creator name.

fields.name: Content Guidelines (Creator)
fields.description: Clarification on AudioX's content policies, prohibited content, or quality standards for creators.

fields.name: Copyright Claim Received (Creator)
fields.description: Seeking advice or help regarding a copyright claim made against content uploaded by the creator.

fields.name: Warning or Strike Inquiry (Creator)
fields.description: Questions about a warning or strike received related to content or account conduct.

fields.name: Appeal Moderation Decision (Creator)
fields.description: Process for appealing a decision related to content removal, account restriction, or ban.

fields.name: Creator Account Suspension/Ban
fields.description: Inquiries related to a suspended or banned creator account.

fields.name: Community Chatroom Access
fields.description: Problems joining or participating in community chatrooms.

fields.name: Report Chatroom Misconduct
fields.description: Reporting inappropriate messages, spam, or user behavior in chatrooms.

fields.name: Chatroom Feature Bug
fields.description: Technical issues or bugs within the community chatroom feature.

fields.name: Report Copyright Infringement
fields.description: Reporting content on AudioX that infringes on your copyright (DMCA takedown requests).

fields.name: Report Inappropriate Content
fields.description: Reporting audiobooks or user-generated content that violates platform policies (hate speech, explicit content, etc.).

fields.name: Report User Misconduct
fields.description: Reporting a user for harassment, spam, impersonation, or other violations.

fields.name: Account Security Concern / Unauthorized Access
fields.description: Suspected unauthorized access to an account or other security vulnerabilities noticed.

fields.name: Privacy Policy Inquiry
fields.description: Questions about AudioX's privacy policy or how user data is handled.

fields.name: Terms of Service Inquiry
fields.description: Questions or requests for clarification regarding AudioX's Terms of Service.

fields.name: Platform Feedback (General)
fields.description: General comments, likes, or dislikes about the AudioX platform.

fields.name: Platform Improvement Suggestion
fields.description: Suggestions for overall platform improvements or new functionalities for all users.

fields.name: Partnership or Business Inquiry
fields.description: For individuals or companies interested in partnerships, advertising, or other business collaborations.

fields.name: Media & Press Inquiry
fields.description: For media personnel or press-related questions.

fields.name: Other (Not Listed)
fields.description: For any issue or question that doesn't fit into the predefined categories.
